trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> evento para ser notificado quando a navegação foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> gera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>, ele também gera <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como tratar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading" /> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading" /> é chamado ou quando uma nova navegação é solicitada durante uma navegação atual.

trans-unit.source: You handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Manipular <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> se desejar descobrir informações pertinentes sobre a solicitação de navegação quando o download é interrompido.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event handler, and includes:
trans-unit.target: Essas informações estão disponíveis do <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> objeto que é passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> manipulador de eventos e inclui:

trans-unit.source: The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: O navegador (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Dados adicionais, se a navegação foi iniciada chamando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> gera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, ele também gera <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como tratar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: Recarrega o conteúdo atual.

trans-unit.source: If the current content (specified by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> property) is navigated to again, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not download the content again.
trans-unit.target: Se o conteúdo atual (especificado pelo valor da <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> propriedade) é direcionada novamente, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> não baixa o conteúdo novamente.

trans-unit.source: To force <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to re-navigate to the content, call <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para forçar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> para navegar novamente para o conteúdo, chame <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Note that if the current content is navigated to again, whether by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>, a new entry is not added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Observe que, se o conteúdo atual é direcionado novamente, ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>, uma nova entrada não é adicionada ao histórico de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.
trans-unit.target: Remove a entrada de diário mais recente do histórico anterior.

trans-unit.source: The most recent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> mais recente no histórico de navegação anterior, se houver.

trans-unit.source: If two or more navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) share the same navigation history, one navigator can use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> to retrieve the back navigation history entry for a navigation that took place in another navigator.
trans-unit.target: Se dois ou mais navegadores (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) compartilham o mesmo histórico de navegação, um navegador pode usar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> para recuperar a entrada do histórico de navegação para uma navegação que ocorreu em outro navegador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of new content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] do conteúdo atual ou o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do conteúdo novo de navegação atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que contém o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] para o conteúdo atual ou o conteúdo de navegação atual.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] than the one currently being displayed, the navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) navigates to the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Se você definir essa propriedade para outro [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] daquela que está sendo exibido no momento, o navegador (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) navega especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> is set to the content that is loaded from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is navigated to, unless the navigation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> é definido como o conteúdo carregado a partir de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] que é direcionada, a menos que a navegação é cancelada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], and can be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> pode ser definido com um fragmento somente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]e pode ser definido como `null`.

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o download de mais de conteúdo para a solicitação de navegação atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> can be called as soon as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> returns, and stops navigation that is in progress in child frames.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> pode ser chamado, assim como <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> retorna e deixa de navegação que está em andamento em quadros filho.

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> must be called on the same thread that initiated the navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> deve ser chamado no mesmo thread que iniciou a navegação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to stop loading.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como interromper o carregamento.
